title: Ataturk: the rise of the Turkish Republic (Turkish Version)
creator_credit: Marianna Norris, Morton Schindel and Sim Productions
brief_description: Presents the history of the Turkish people and the role of Ataturk in its rise to nationhood in the twentieth century. Narration is in the Turkish language.
